school_name: Montgomery College: Takoma Park/Silver Spring Campus
comments: She\'s a good person, but I just don\'t feel she teaches well. If you can devote your life for the semester to her class then you\'ll be ok. Going too fast is an understatement. You better find a native Arab speaker or move to an Arab speaking country while taking her class. Seriously...

school_name: Montgomery College: Takoma Park/Silver Spring Campus
comments: Excellent at explaining grammar. Sees to always understand what each student does not understand, and able to explain it. Best language teacher I\'ve ever had.

comments: She\'es the worst teacher I\'ve ever had. She likes talking about her husband during class who\'s from pakistan.., She\'s super rude and has a funny English. She needs to improve her English I guess before using this language as a tool to teach Arabic.
